title: Collaborative Design and Iterative Testing Workshop for Educational Game Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: Learners are general citizens with intermediate expertise in science, strengthening collaborative problem-solving skills through educational game development projects.

learning_goals: Learning objectives for educational games can be clearly defined in three or more ways linked to scientific content.
Game design prototypes are iteratively improved at least twice using a collaborative design process.
User feedback is incorporated through repeated testing, achieving at least 80% on game effectiveness evaluation metrics.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
